SELECT emp_id,emp_name
,SUM (before_road_input_num) as work_num, SUM (before_road_input_hours) as hours, SUM (before_road_audit_num) as work_num2, SUM (before_road_audit_hours) as hours2
,SUM (fm_cp_input_num) as work_num, SUM (fm_cp_input_hours) as hours, SUM (fm_cp_audit_num) as work_num2, SUM (fm_cp_audit_hours) as hours2
,SUM (fm_ca_input_num) as work_num, SUM (fm_ca_input_hours) as hours, SUM (fm_ca_audit_num) as work_num2, SUM (fm_ca_audit_hours) as hours2
,SUM (fm_ep_input_num) as work_num, SUM (fm_ep_input_hours) as hours, SUM (fm_ep_audit_num) as work_num2, SUM (fm_ep_audit_hours) as hours2
,SUM (fm_ea_input_num) as work_num, SUM (fm_ea_input_hours) as hours, SUM (fm_ea_audit_num) as work_num2, SUM (fm_ea_audit_hours) as hours2
,SUM (dp_info_work_num) as work_num, SUM (dp_info_work_hours) as hours, SUM (dp_info_audit_num) as work_num2, SUM (dp_info_audit_hours) as hours2
,SUM (before_agency_work_num) as work_num, SUM (before_agency_work_hours) as hours, SUM (after_agency_work_num) as work_num2, SUM (after_agency_work_hours) as hours2
FROM WORK_EFFICIENCY
EMP_ID =#{empId}
AND EMP_NAME=#{empName}
AND WORK_DATE >=to_date( #{searchDateStart},'yyyy/mm/dd')
AND WORK_DATE <=to_date( #{searchDateEnd},'yyyy/mm/dd')
GROUP BY emp_id,emp_name
